name: Quinoa Salad With Red Pepper And Cumin Vinaigrette
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup red pepper and cumin vinaigrette (see recipe)
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the shallots and saute for about 20 seconds. Add the corn and zucchini and saute until just tender, about 2 to 3 minutes.

Place the quinoa in a large bowl and toss well with the corn and zucchini. Mix in the vinaigrette and season with salt and pepper to taste. Divide the salad among 4 plates, garnish with the cilantro and serve immediately.
